PrecisAuthority for the Minister of Foreign Affairs (a) to sign the PROTOCOL ON HEAVY METALS to the 1979 CONVENTION ON LONG-RANGE TRANSBOUNDARY AIR POLLUTION, or (b) to issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing other Canadian officials to sign the Protocol on behalf of Canada.
